page.title: 08The Abandoned Graveyard
page.content: As our group walked along the main road to Screel we noticed a small churchyard beside Kirkland farm. The church has very little remains. It was on the west side of the churchyard on a hill. There are yew trees in the churchyard. It looks like the grass never gets cut although we found out that council workers came some times. The newest grave was put in on 9th November 1978. The oldest grave was put in, in 1751. There are 30 graves and two of them are broken. The man's name who has recently died is Simon Andrew Phillpotts.
